normal.  Over USB the address is 172.22.11.2.  Connected any other way the roboRIO is probably DHCP (unless you set it to static) which would mean it would need to get an address from the radio.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWhat do you mean, “I guess the usb port does support networking”?  It has always worked under the above address for both imaging and normal robot communication.
